text: Petr Kalina (born 9 July 1997) is a Czech professional ice hockey player. He is currently playing for HC Sparta Praha of the Czech Extraliga. Kalina made his Czech Extraliga debut playing with HC Sparta Praha during the 2015–16 Czech Extraliga season. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:HC Benátky nad Jizerou players Category:HC Sparta Praha players Category:Czech ice hockey defencemen
title: Petr Kalina
